scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains three scrapbooks of materials relating to theatrical performances and stage performers. The scrapbooks contain such materials as photographs, playbills, and programs for various theatrical productions in New York City. Among the plays represented are "The Admirable Crichton" with William Gillette, "The Taming of the Shrew" with Otis Skinner, "Cousin Kate" with Ethel Barrymore, and "The Little Minister" with Maude Adams. The scrapbooks also contain biographical information and reviews.
